description: Lush potted plants hang from the ceiling, thriving from the sunlight filtering through the numerous windows of this hallway.  A glass enclosed pedestal stands near the middle of the hall, a shattered talon-hilted longsword within it.

Lush potted plants hang from the ceiling, thriving from the sunlight that filters through the numerous windows during the day.  A glass enclosed pedestal stands near the middle of the hall, a shattered talon-hilted longsword within it.
title: [Citadel, Hallway]
